title: Man On The Moon [PAL] [Eng-Spa]
description:
MOVIE INFO

-Original Title: Man on the Moon
-Year: 1999
-Director: Milos Forman
-Cast: Jim Carrey, Danny DeVito, Courtney Love, Paul Giamatti, Tony Clifton, Marilu Henner, Judd Hirsch, Christopher Lloyd, Norm MacDonald, Vincent Schiavelli, Brent Briscoe, Christina Cabot
-Runtime: 118 min
-Genre: Biography / Comedy / Drama
-Plot Outline: Based on the true story, Jim Carrey stunningly portrays the late Andy Kaufman -- considered to be one of the most innovative, eccentric and enigmatic comics of his time -- in Man On The Moon. "Jim Carrey is extraordinary." says The New York Post. "Jim Carrey may be a better Andy Kaufman than Andy Kaufman" writes Newsweek. Also starring Danny DeVito as Kaufman&#039;s manager, Courtney Love as the woman Andy falls in love with and Paul Giamatti as his best friend. You&#039;ll stand up and cheer for Carrey in one of the year&#039;s most entertaining movies!

DVD INFO:

-SYSTEM: PAL
-ASPECT RATIO: 2.35:1, 16:9 Widescreen
-AUDIO: English 5.1, Spanish 2.0
-SUBTITLES: Spanish
-INFO EXTRA:

*Interactive Menu
*Scene Selection
*Deleted scenes
*Filming scenes
*Biographies and interviews
*REM Music Video

Trailers and warnings removed.

-FORMAT: DVD9
-COMPRESSION: No compression.
